name: Autumn
summary: The season series of Silly Symphonies continues, with squirrels storing nuts and corn, crows stealing it, beavers building a dam, ducks migrating, and the like, as the first snows fall.
info:
• 中文名: 秋
  • 话数: 1
  • 上映年度: 1930-02-13
  • 片长: 6m
  • 语言: 无对白
  • 制片国家/地区: 美国
  • 导演: Ub Iwerks
